description: They say a pet is a friend for life, but the rising number of abandoned pets suggests otherwise in Singapore. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: The law needs more bite against people who abuse or abandon animals
title_page: The law needs more bite against people who abuse or abandon animals | The Straits Times
maintext:
When it comes to animal cruelty, I feel an intense need to say something.
Animal cruelty and abandonment cases reached an 11-year high when the Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (SPCA) detailed a 79 per cent increase in reported cases in its 2023 annual report. It investigated more than 900 cases in 2023.
